title: cultural_data_Carnavalet_museum_Step_by_step
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=fr.carnavaletHLM.Android.
Application Name: Carnavalet museum Step by step.
Number of Reviews: 5.00.
Application Description: This application was developed to enable a more personal discovery of the Museum's collections through the streets of the city. It enables users to find almost 300 emblematic works from the Museum, re-positioned in the Parisian landscape. It offers plenty of opportunities to discover the works in the places that inspired them, along with the story of Paris and the Parisians behind them.The Musée Carnavalet is the biggest history museum in the City of Paris. On 4 October 2016, the Museum closed its doors for major renovation works. It is scheduled to re-open in early 2020. For more information, go to the Museum’s Internet site: http://www.carnavalet.paris.frRead moreCollapse.
